WItem.en-US: Please fill in all the fields.
An error occurred when sign off Waveface Station.
You need to first uninstall Waveface Station to proceed.
WItem.zh-TW: 您必須移除舊的Waveface Station後, 才能安裝新的。

WItem.en-US: Are you sure to quit the Dropbox setup process?
WItem.zh-TW: 您是否確定要結束Dropbox安裝、連結程序?

WItem.en-US: Invalid user name or password. Please try again.
WItem.zh-TW: 帳號或密碼錯誤 請再試一次

WItem.en-US: Waveface Station service is not completely started. Please wait for a while and try again, or ensure the running status of Waveface Station windows service.
WItem.zh-TW: Waveface Station服務未完全啟動, 請稍候一會再登入, 或確認Waveface Station服務啟動狀態.

WItem.en-US: Unexpected error occured. Please try again.
WItem.zh-TW: 發生了不預期的錯誤 請再試一次

WItem.en-US: Waveface Station already has a registered user. Adding another one is not allowed.
WItem.zh-TW: Waveface Station已經有了一個已註冊的使用者, 無法再增加另一位
